Text:
Great torrent as always. 

I was just wondering if you would be posting the christmas movie when its out?

Now that I've heard of it, I'll be on the lookout for it.

Any idea when it is supposed to air?

If it is coming to the theaters, then I won't be able to upload that. I don't have any ability or desire to get into the cam side of things.
Sometime in December. And no its a two hour TV movie. They haven't given a date for it to show yet.

I am unable to upload Heartland S03E16 here since the upload function here is broken at the moment.

But I have uploaded it to monova and extratorrent.

You can find it there by searching Google with:

Heartland S03E16 err0001

I'll upload it here when upload functionality returns.
